11.content:
Arceus, God of all pokémon looked upon the world solemnly from atop the Hall of Origin. Eventually after he was done looking, she sighed in weariness. From the shadows crept Giratina, lord of death.

"What troubles you, Arceus?" asked the embodiment of antimatter.

After another sigh, the white equine being explained: "Yveltal, the guardian of death, has just been captured by a stupid trainer by using a master ball."

"Hah."

"Giratina, this is no joke!" Arceus snapped.

"Is too. I'M supposed to be the guardian of death, remember? That stupid bird is just a poser." Giratina rolled his eyes.

"For the last freaking time..." the white god closed its eyes in frustration "YOU are the guardian of the afterlife, you govern the afterlife! YVELTAL guards death, just death, and not the afterlife!"

"I can do both!"

"I'm not having this conversation." Arceus turned away "The point is, legendarys are being captured one after another thanks to that stupid master ball!"

"It is kind of weird that godlike beings like us can be just caught and wielded by ten year olds..." admitted the serpentine ghost type.

"Something must be done." Arceus stamped his hoof, clocking her gaze towards the world once more "Something must be done... or else the world's balance may fall apart."

"Why don't you just make a new legendary, one that can't be caught by pokéballs?"

"I tried that." Arceus said back, "It... didn't work so well..."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------
MEANWHILE IN ALOLA


Nihilego: "GRAAHHBLAGLAR!!"


Guzzlord: "WRAAARGHH!"


Kartana: "SHHSHSHHHSHH!"


A trainer gazed upon these abominations in fear, then ran away as fast as he could.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------

"And in the end they just found a way to capture those as well! Somehow!" the equine being complained.


Giratina silenced himself, thinking and letting his creator do the same. After a while, Giratina couldn't come up with anything, so he began gazing into other dimensions, silently watching while eating popcorn.


"Maybe... maybe I should create like... a thing with... and it'll be able to do stuff..." Arceus tried to think, but was distracted by Giratina's portal watching. He stomped over to where the ghost dragon was, demanding that he stop doing that.


"Oh come on, most of these dimensions run like TV shows! And this ones about to get good!" complained the guardian of death. Arceus looked into his portal to see what the fuss was about. In there, he saw two humans fighting. One of them was an orange haired punk kid with a sleek black sword, while the other was a butterfly.


"Aizen, Imma kill you because you're an asshole!" stated the orange haired one in the most brooding voice imaginable.


"LOL I'm too much of a troll for that!" said the butterfly "I'm so broken that I can use my shikai to make illusions so great that they-"


The orange haired man then punched the butterfly through several walls. An amazing fight ensued, but for some reason the butterfly never used his broken illusion abilities for the duration of the match, costing him his life.


"What the-?" Arceus wasn't familiar with this.


"In some other dimensions, it's actually the humans who have great powers! Isn't it funny how the multiverse works?"


Something clicked within God's brain.


"Wouldn't it be funny if the human in our universe had those kinds of powers?" Giratina rambled on.


Arceus silenced him just then, "Giratina... I have an idea..."


Misty Waterflower was still a tomboy even in her adulthood. She was physically active, wasn’t afraid of any dirt, wore the barest minimum of makeup at all times and never could wear a dress. However, as an adult, her body was no longer remotely tomboyish. Sporting a modest bust and wide hips that made even the white guys go “DAY-UMM!”, she had blossomed into a very mature looking woman.

Her orange hair had grown out but was still cropped short, only reaching to her shoulders. Her lips were a darker shade of pink due to her lipstick, her eyes still as green as the depths of the sea. Because she was at that age, her usual gym attire consisted of a dramatic cape coat, a blue sports bra-like top and the shortest, tightest short bottoms ever conceived by mankind. Her hips were one of her best and biggest features, wider than her own shoulders with a great butt to match, so it was only natural she’d show it off as much as possible.

This elicited a response from the 14 year old male trainer who had just come in to challenge her. And by response, we mean his penis became erect.

“I-I challenge you for a gym badge!” Said the young boy, blushing at Misty’s incredibly attractive figure. He nearly fainted when she turned around to gather her pokéballs, giving him a view of her extraordinarily large rear.

“Challenge accepted!” Misty smiled. As was tradition for her family, she had taken over the Cerulean City Gym. She didn’t mind it, wanting to be the greatest water trainer, plus her sisters weren’t even remotely qualified to handle gym leader responsibilities.

“Go, Ivysaur!” the male trainer shouted, summoning the grass type pokémon from a pokéball. He forced himself to ignore Misty’s womanly body- he had heard rumors that she was one of the toughest gym leaders in the Kanto league, and he needed to be prepared. Luckily, his Ivysaur was a grass type, so he had a type advantage…

“Go, Magikarp!”

Misty sent out a weak looking orange fish, who flopped around uselessly going “KARP? KARP?” as if it had no idea where it was or what it was doing.

The male trainer narrowed his eyes, a Magikarp, one of the weakest pokémon in the world? Wasn’t Misty supposed to be extremely strong?

“Magikarp, use Tackle!”

And then the pathetic orange fish managed to Tackle Ivysaur across the room where it landed painfully into a wall, making cracks in it. His Ivysaur got up weakly, and the trainer knew this was serious.

“Razor Leaf!” dozens of leaves were thrown at the orange fish, who somehow dodged them all by using a Splash attack. Before the trainer could question how a mere Magikarp could be this strong, it Tackled his Ivysaur again dealing massive damage.

“Ivysaur, use Sleep Powder!” luckily the trainer thought of using this drowsing move to stall the Magikarp’s movements. The orange fish breathed in the powder, and subsequently fell asleep. From there it was an easy victory with Ivysaur launching many leaves at the fish, causing it to faint.

“You did well, Magikarp!” The orange haired water trainer recalled her pokémon. This was a standard 2v2 match, and right now the challenging trainer had one victory. Another, and he would win the Cascade Badge. But of course, Misty wouldn’t go down without a fight.

“Go, Starmie!” Misty called her ace pokémon, a water psychic starfish like creature with a red gem in its center. This one seemed very well trained, which made the challenger wary.

“No, I won’t lose confidence.” he said to himself, “Ivysaur can take this, and even if he can’t, I still have my Pikachu. Ivysaur, hit it with a Poison powder!”

“Starmie, use Bubble beam!”

Five seconds later, the left side of the gym exploded, scattering debris everywhere. The denizens of cerulean paid it no heed- this was the fifth time this week. They merely suspected it was another challenger foolishly trying to beat their gym leader and moved on with their lives. Indeed their suspicions were correct- the Ivysaur had been defeated in a single second, while the Pikachu took another three, thus explaining the explosion.

“Oops, I overdid it…” Misty gazed on the damage to her gym. When the challenger had sent out a Pikachu, instinct took over and she commanded Starmie to launch its strongest attack, subconsciously comparing this electric mouse to another she knew all too well. Nostalgia took over for a split second as she remembered the face of the man she once loved, but shook those thoughts away. That was in the past.

“Well, sorry kid, but no badge today. Come back another time!” the gym leader waved cheerfully as the crying trainer tended to his pokémon, running to the nearest pokémon center which was now a booming business in this city. As soon as he exited..
11.title: Misty

112.content:
Arceus entered the building through the new opening in the wall caused by the damage.

“Hey” God said as he casually walked into the ruined gym. For a few moments, Misty just stood there, not comprehending what happened, until her brain started to work again. Misty was face to face with a ten foot tall white equine being with gray contours. It had a glowing golden dais in its midsection and piercing green eyes that saw all.

“Arceus?!”

“No, I’m Wynaut. YES I’M ARCEUS DAMNIT!”

Misty was awestruck the god of all pokémon was standing right in front of her! Instinctively, she bowed out of respect, as well as her Pokemon. Arceus looked upon this with disdain: “Oh don’t grovel! One thing I can’t stand it’s people groveling!”


“Sorry!” Misty said as she stood back up. “I...Im not well practised in how to talk with...God.”

“And don’t apologize! Every time I talk to someone it’s ‘sorry’ this and ‘forgive me’ that and ‘I am not worthy’…”


Arceus noticed that the human in front of her as well as her Pokemon were turned away, only indirectly looking at him. “What are you doing now?”

“I’m...being respectful?” Misty asked, trying very hard to not upset her literal creator. Arceus rolled his eyes and waved his hoof around in a dismissing gesture to stop. Clearing its throat, the god of all pokémon began to speak.


“Listen to me. I have an incredibly task for you. Arceus began his story: he briefly explained that legendarys were constantly getting kidnapped in pokéballs by ten year olds who had just started their journey, and while capture they couldn’t perform their normal duties as gods of balance.

Attempts at making a pokémon that couldn’t be caught had failed… and even the omniscient creator of the world didn’t know whether or not it was even a pokémon.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------

Nihilego: "GRAAHHBLAGLAR!!"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------

However, Arceus had another idea. This one would work for sure because the next legendary would be absolutely impossible to catch. To put it simply, Arceus announced

“I’m going to turn you into a Legendary Pokémon!”


Misty and her Pokemon were utterly flabbergasted. “Now hold on a second!” Misty said in an effort to remain levelheaded. “Arceus, what do you mean by that, exactly?”

“I mean exactly what I mean.” Said the god back, “You have been chosen o wield immense power equal to that of a legendary pokémon. You will gain those powers as well as turn into a pokémon/human hybrid, which will never be able to be capture by pokéballs!”

“So wait… we’ll start turning into pokémon?” Misty asked.

“Yes and no. The transformation will make you half pokémon, but you will mostly be in control of how you transform. Unless you’re a furry, you’ll probably look 95% human by the time this is done.”


And Misty was not a furry. Next, the water gym leader had another question. “So our bodies will transform, but only what we want them to be?”

“Mostly. If for instance you wanted larger mammary glands, that would happen. If you wanted to fire laser beams from your ears that would also happen.”


“Hmph…” At the mention of bigger breasts, Misty squeezed her C cups together, making some ample cleavage. Yes, her hips and butt were her most prominent feature, and she always tried to flaunt whenever she could, but she always feeled she felt...well, cheated when it came to chest size. Other girls around the town were humongous H cups while she was almost flat chested. Sometimes, she wished she wasn’t so busy… and other times she wished she had bigger boobs.


“Wait, I just realized something.” Misty said, “Why ME? Why was I chosen- what makes me so special?”

“When I first tested this I realized that all humans have a defined ‘potential’ for this transformation.” further explained the white deity, “The greater this potential is, the more powers you can amass and attain. So…I decided to go around the world and measure the potentials of different humans.”

“Wait… so that’s why…?” May began to put the pieces together.

“You have incredibly high potential. Aside from that, I had to pick people who weren’t evil or would abuse that power. You were the most obvious choice. Of course, I won’t force this on you…”

“Oh I’m already in. Getting pokémon powers sounds awesome!” Misty gave a triumphant grin. So let’s do it! Arceus- please turn me into a legendary please
112.title: Arceus Entered

1122.content:
Instantly, Misty was surrounded by a silverlight, quickly turning into something resembling a translucent golden egg. This strange flux of energy surrounded and permeated her very core. The sensations they felt could not be described in words- it was painful, but joyous. It was exhilarating, but expectant.

Right now, Arceus was altering both her body and mind with pokémon DNA, his own energy, and connecting her potential to her powers.This would allow her to become an entirely new life form- perfectly capable of become a legend.


The entire process took ten minutes to complete. When it was finally over, a brilliant flash of light broke the metaphorical womb and Misty stood back up, having regained full awareness.


They're as only one external feature about Misty that had changed during those 10 minutes in the golden egg of power. Misty had gone from well-proportionally bottom heavy, to what you might say, “busty”…if your vocabulary entirely failed you, that is. Colossal might be more accurate. Ridiculously, massively, unbelievably, and impossibly busty.


Misty stood on the linoleum tiled floor of her gym contemplating her life and situation. Her first thought strayed to her breasts. Misty’s colossal bust. Breasts that are each as big as a school bus. Actually, she thought proudly, a fair bit bigger in every way than a school bus. If she set one of her monsters next to a bus, and you stood on the bus side, you would be able to see her breast dimensions in full. The top of her breasts would be visible over the top of the bus, her phenomenal thicker than her leg nipple would be visible beyond the front of the bus, and her personage would be visible behind the bus. If you stood on her breast side, you wouldn’t be able to see the bus at all. To think, she might be actually be able to literally conceal a bus in the valley between her BREASTS. At least, for the few seconds she could resist her compulsion to crush the bus between them, she admitted to herself. She bit her lip gently as the eroticism of that thought swept through her, and made a mental note: CRUSH BUS SOMEDAY. That brought her to ruminate on the other aspects of her chest. They aren’t just longer than school buses and tall enough to obscure up to halfway of the second story of a house, but they are also immensely fat at some 5 times wider than a bus. Her areolas alone are 5 feet wide, surrounding massive nipples that are a foot thick in diameter, but short and stumpy. Stumpy relative to their massive surroundings, that is. When aroused, however, look out in front, she thought with a smile.

“Hmmm…” Arceus mused as he eyed Misty’s new assets. “Well...someone is a bit chest focused.”

It was a good thing that Misty was in her gym when the transformation happened. There was no sense in owning a house that she could never fit inside now. “Hell, my AREOLA are each wider than doorways”, she thought to herself happily. As it is,her breasts had grown to slump into her indoor pool, causing water to splash all around. Her Pokemon eyed the two monsters with awe. She glanced around further and saw her Pokemon gaze at their master with jaws dropped and eyes wide. That was a thought too far and she writhed in the sudden surge of ecstasy. Many of Misty’s thoughts were tending to lead to her breasts, one way or another. She never got over just how MASSIVE she was, and she LOVED IT! It still boggled her mind how incomprehensibly vast she was.

It wasn't until a few minutes later that she was stark naked.

And to her honest surprise...she found she didn't really care. All of this occurred in five minutes before Misty spontaneously got a headache. “Oh by the way the procedure takes a lot out of you, you’ll probably be very-” Arceus was interrupted as Misty crashed onto her massive boobs, using them as pillows, sleeping. “… Yes, tired. Hm. Alright. Well enjoy your newfound powers, Misty. I’ll make sure to talk to you tomorrow about how to control them.”

With a quick warping of the space-time continuum, Arceus was gone, and Misty’s Pokemon started silently at their trainer using her own breasts as pillows.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------

In the middle of the night, a good six hours since the transformation,Misty slept soundly without complications. While she layed on her own valley of cleavage dreaming, her body slowly began to change…

11223.content:
Psyduck woke up with a raging headache, as usual, causing him to bowl over in pain. However, the headache subsided in less than a minute, thankfully. The yellow duck Pokemon found himself in an familiar room, but at the same time not the room she should be in-it was the Pokemon Gym, his trainer's gym. Panic began to set in as he could not remember how he got there. He should be in his Pokeball right now! But a large yawn made it's way from across the room, somewhere.

Turning his head, Psyduck saw his trainer, Misty, beached to the floor with two school buses for breasts with her sleeping on them.

Psyduck was wide eyed at what just he saw. Then, his memories clicked in.

“Oh yeah. She's part Pokemon now.”

Truthfully, Psyduck did not understand what happened yesterday, or why Arceus was there, or why Misty seemed to like her newfound body so much, but he did know that she forgot to put him back in his Pokeball before falling asleep. In fact, she forgot to put all of them back inn their Pokeballs! Turning bac around, Psyduck saw that all of her Pokemon had fallen asleep in a huge pile on the floor, waiting for Misty to feed them.

Understandably, Psyduck was a little miffed at the situation. So much so, that he was determined to march right up to her trainer, wake her up, and demand that he be fed! Well, maybe not demand, but still. With a huff, Psyduck turned back around to face his sleeping goddess slash trainer, but paused as something...began to happen to her right in front if his eyes.

While Misty's tits were enormous on their own right, it appeared that Misty's behind as well began to undergo a side affect of the new power radiating through her body. Slowly, but most surely, her hips shoved out of her skimpy tight shorts, leaving them to hang out for all the world to see, widening and thickening, broadening by entire feet as the Pokemon/Human fusion's hourglass figure perfects itself, more of her body smothering the tiled floor of her gym. In her sleep, Misty tongue lolls out of her mouth, and her moans fill the building, rattling the windows and threatening to set off car alarms up and down the street outside. her butt begins to grow - both smooth, globular and perky cheeks expanding; inflating; almost flowing outwards, growing in a single smooth surge of size - rounder, even perkier, larger and larger. Handfuls of supple buttflesh become more than handfuls, then more than that; her skin soft and smooth enough to engulf the hands of anyone daring enough to grope her.


It was not until Misty had acquired the perfect bubble butt did the growth finally stop. Her gigantic rear end gently smooshed into the side of the building, making the place creak and groan in protest. They were perfectly the exact same size as Misty's breasts, that is to say, the size of a school bus. Each. To Psyduck, it was rather curious to see his trainer be like this, sandwiched between wobbling masses that just so happened to be apart of her body. Like a toothpick smashed in between two Wailords.

Realizing he was too tired to put up with another round of Misty being expanded, Psyduck went back to the pile of Pokemon to go back to sleep. He could eat tomorrow. Besides, it was never a good idea to wake up Misty.

The Next Morning...
